title: Exploring Structural Dynamics of Small Pt Nanoparticles on Ceria
content: We explore small Pt nanoparticles on CeO2 in an interdisciplinary study combining in-situ and ex-situ scanning transmission electron microscopy (STEM), size-selected cluster deposition, neural networks, and density functional theory (DFT), to provide fundamental insights into the structure and dynamics of supported nanoparticles under various conditions [1].
